original_text: For the Lord hath redeemed Jacob, and ransomed him from the hand of him that was stronger than he.
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱을 구원하시되 그들보다 강한 자의 손에서 속량하셨으니

sentences.original_text: For the Lord hath redeemed Jacob
and ransomed him from the hand of him

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 더 강한 자의 손에서 구속하셨느니라
